name: Incline Village Golf Courses
description: Incline Village Golf Courses, featuring the Championship Course and the Mountain Course, offer a uniquely stunning golf experience with breathtaking views of Lake Tahoe and the surrounding Sierra Nevada mountains. The Championship Course provides a classic, challenging layout with pristine conditions, while the Mountain Course delivers a fun and scenic test with dramatic elevation changes and tight, tree-lined fairways. With world-class practice facilities, a welcoming atmosphere, and the perfect blend of challenge and beauty, Incline Village Golf Courses are a must-play for golfers seeking an unforgettable alpine golf adventure..

faqs.question: What’s included in Incline Village golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, tee times at Championship and Mountain courses, carts, and concierge planning. Add-ons include dining and transportation.

faqs.question: How much do Incline Village golf packages cost?
faqs.answer: Packages typically range $189–$449 depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—group tee sheets, lodging blocks, banquets, and tournament setup are available for corporate and leisure groups.

Incline Village Golf Courses – Incline Village, NV
Location:
Fairway Boulevard, Incline Village, NV
Distance from Key Locations:
5 Minutes – Incline Village, NV
40 Minutes – Downtown Reno
45 Minutes – Peppermill & Atlantis Casino Resorts (Reno)
50 Minutes – Carson City, NV
60 Minutes – Truckee, CA
75 Minutes – Stateline, NV (Lake Tahoe Casinos)
85 Minutes – Graeagle, CA
90 Minutes – Minden, NV

Incline Village offers two distinct layouts: the
Championship Course
, a full-length par-72 with Lake Tahoe views, and the
Mountain Course
, a scenic par-58 executive track with dramatic elevation changes.
Guests enjoy a driving range, short game area, golf shop, clubhouse dining, PGA professional instruction, club rentals, on-course refreshments, and event hosting.
The courses are about 40 minutes from Downtown Reno, 60 minutes from Truckee, and 75 minutes from the Stateline, NV casinos at Lake Tahoe.

tips.title: The Hack!
tips.content: The Mountain Course is a great track on a first day of a multi-day golf trip.  It’s easier to get a tee time there as well, as the locals have a priority booking window that can limit availability on the Championship Course.  If you work with us, we can book well in advance, even before the locals gobble up all the times!

featuredHole.title: Hole #8 — Par 3
featuredHole.description: A stunning downhill par 3 with Lake Tahoe glimmering through the pines behind the green. The elevation change makes club selection tricky — play one less than the yardage calls for.
